name: Haywire (itch) (fiascosoftworks)
description:
You start by hacking into a steambot. 

-Every 10 seconds, your steambot will lose some health as it attempts to fight the hack. Your health can be seen above your steambot.

 -Once every 10 seconds you can shoot out a signal that takes over another steambot. Try to hack into another steambot before the one you control dies. 

-Enemy steambots will spawn and try to eliminate their infected brethren, take them out and survive as long as you can. Ditch dying steambots for new ones. 

-Every steambot has an attacking and defensive power. Use them both to your advantage, experiment with the many combinations by hacking enemy steambots.

 -Move: WASD, Aim: mouse 

Powers: 

Purple Missile: large damage single shot 

Green Acid: close range cone 

Red Flames: continuous damage beam Shield: invulnerable for a time Overclock: brief speed boost Dash: quick forward movement 

Oil Slick: Slows down anyone passing over it
